0011011111101111 0101010001100100 1 -> sum: 1000110001010100, cout: 0
1101111011111000 0101101100100010 1 -> sum: 0011101000011011, cout: 1
0011011010001000 0011010111100010 0 -> sum: 0110110001101010, cout: 0
1001011001100100 1000001101001110 0 -> sum: 0001100110110010, cout: 1
0111010010001111 1010010101000001 0 -> sum: 0001100111010000, cout: 1
0000011011011000 1001001010100110 0 -> sum: 1001100101111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
